infos.name: corridor
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a corridor. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can see a shoe cabinet.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The shoe cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a key holder. The key holder is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the key holder you can see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty.[end if] Hey, want to see an umbrella stand? Look over there, an umbrella stand. The umbrella stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_1] On the umbrella stand you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a coat hanger. [if there is something on the s_2]On the coat hanger you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Hm. Oh well[end if] You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a hat rack. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a hat rack? The hat rack is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_3] On the hat rack you make out [a list of things on the s_3]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] The hat rack appears to be empty.[end if]

infos.name: shoe cabinet
infos.desc: The [noun] looks towering. [if open]It is open.[else if locked]It is locked.[otherwise]It is closed.[end if]

infos.name: scarf
infos.desc: The [noun] appears to be well matched to everything else here

metadata.goal: Look for anything that is out of place and put it away in its proper location.

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! You find yourself in a messy house. Many things are not in their usual location. Let's clean up this place. After you'll have done, this little house is going to be spick and span! Look for anything that is out of place and put it away in its proper location.
